Uses of Class
a11rallypong.base

    • Uses of base in a11rallypong

      Subclasses of base in a11rallypong 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ball
      The ball class creates a ball that moves around on the screen and is hit back and forth between two paddles.
      class  paddle
      The paddle class extends the base class to make a rectangle on the screen used to hit the ball back and forth.
      Methods in a11rallypong with parameters of type base 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Boolean base.collisionCheck(base o2)
      The collisionCheck method compares the locations of the ball (this) and the paddle (o2) and returns true if they have collided.
      void base.deflect(base o2)
      The deflect method applies a 'spin' on the ball relative to how far from the center of the paddle the ball hit.
      void base.hitCheck(base o2)
      A function that sees if collisionCheck is true and calls the deflect and bounce methods if it is true.
